response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our premium product, which I believe holds immense value for you at $1,500,000. This extraordinary item not only meets but exceeds your expectations, offering unparalleled benefits and features that align perfectly with your needs and aspirations.

To facilitate this transaction, I propose a purchase price of $1,350,000. This offer represents a strategic balance between the intrinsic worth of the product and the potential value it could bring to you. I am confident that this price will allow us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement while ensuring you receive the best possible return on your investment.

Please consider this proposal carefully. If you find this offer favorable, kindly let me know so we can proceed with the necessary arrangements. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me.

Looking forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1350000}
